native-type.description: Native type, optional values are 'button' 'submit' reset
native-type.description_zh: 原生类型，可选值为 `button` `submit` reset

loading-radius.description_zh: loading 的半径，只作用于 `loading-type="circle"` 时

loading-type.description: loading, with optional values of 'circle', 'wave', 'cube', 'rect' disappear
loading-type.description_zh: loading 的类型，可选值为 `circle` `wave` `cube` `rect` disappear

loading-size.description: loading, with optional values of 'large' 'normal' 'small' mini
loading-size.description_zh: loading 的尺寸，可选值为 `large` `normal` `small` mini

auto-loading.description: Automatic loading mode for asynchronous tasks
auto-loading.description_zh: 自动 loading 模式，方便处理异步任务

round.description: Whether it's a round button or not

text.description: Whether it's a text button or not

outline.description: Whether to use an outer border

ripple.description: Whether or not to use water ripples

elevation.description: Altitude, with selectable values of 'true', 'false', and '0-24'
elevation.description_zh: 海拔高度，可选值为 `true`、`false` 和 `0-24` 的等级

events.name: click
events.description: Triggers when the button is clicked, not when the 'loading' or 'disabled' state is 'true'
events.params: 点击按钮时触发，在 `loading` 或 `disabled` 状态为 `true` 时不触发
events.description_zh: 点击按钮时触发，在 `loading` 或 `disabled` 状态为 `true` 时不触发

events.name: touchstart
events.description: Triggers when the touch finger presses down on the button, not when the 'loading' or 'disabled' state is 'true'
events.params: 触摸手指压下按钮时触发，在 `loading` 或 `disabled` 状态为 `true` 时不触发
events.description_zh: 触摸手指压下按钮时触发，在 `loading` 或 `disabled` 状态为 `true` 时不触发
